articles.author: Mark Bergin, WRAL senior multiplatform producer
articles.title: Philip Rivers to work out for Indianapolis Colts, reports say - WRAL
articles.description: Rivers spent 17 seasons in the NFL and last played professionally in 2020 for the Colts.
articles.content:
The Indianapolis Colts are planning to work out Philip Rivers on Tuesday after starting quarterback Daniel Jones suffered a season-ending Achilles injury, according to multiple media reports.
